item.description:
BHANGRA VS BOLLYWOOD @ MANTRA BOSTON on SATURDAY APRIL 27th with 2 Dj's Battling it out & a Live Dholi !!

Let's celebrate on "April 27th" - BHANGRA VS BOLLYWOOD at MANTRA BOSTON.

Make sure to have your dancing shoes onn and Rock the night away. Party with BU, NU, Tufts, Harvard, MIT, Berklee, Simmons and many more.

Dj Battle - Dj Rohit vs Dj Sanat | Bhangra vs Bollywood | Hip Hop-House-Top 40 & a Live Dholi

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dj's will play Bollywood/ Bhangra/ Remixes/Top 40 & Desi Mashups & Today's Top Hip Hop mixes

Ladies free before 10:30 PM with RSVP. Tix $8 in advance through www.Generationdesi.com

Get there early. You don't want to miss out on a fun party.

For RSVP email: Generationdesi@gmail.com

Doors at 9 PM sharp. Dress to Impress.

Questions call Ravi 617-416-8705 or Jeet 617-216-1492 or RSVP: Generationdesi@gmail.com
item.name: 2 Dj's | 1 Dholi | BOLLYWOOD VS BHANGRA @ MANTRA SATURDAY APRIL 27th!
